author: Antonio Hernandez
comment: Really enjoy the design scheme of the watch face and appreciate that it displays enough information on screen without being cumbersome. Choosing which apps or widgets I want to access through touchable icons is a nice feature. And a shout-out to the developer for responding to my email on a question I had in a timely manner. Really appreciate that.

author: Jason Ewing
comment: yeah

author: Twisted World
comment: The smooth animation with the moving bars is nowhere to be found on my ZenWatch 3. Not sure what type of watch is used to make the video, but it sure as hell doesn't look like that in real life!

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Did you install the mobile app, as suggested in the settings? You will find a settings to set the animation to "fast/slow/off" (the faster it is, the more it uses battery).

author: Alan Bartlett
comment: All interactive sections work very well and the face looks great. Just wish this could save different colour schemes like I can do on the Octane watch face from the same maker. Please consider adding this feature as I have purchased a few watch faces from you now and this is a great feature to have, as I use this one and Octane face every day. Keep up the good work.

author: Outlaw Killeru
comment: Why can't I open the mobile app to edit the colors? It's only possible via the watch and it's very time consuming. The mobile app can't be opened at all, only "Uninstall" option is available.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. You can access the app by going in the Android Wear app. Then hit the geqrbicon displayed over the watch face preview ;)

author: RAY B.
comment: Looks and runs great.

author: William Trobaugh
comment: Great app

author: Paul Carlin
comment: I like

author: Jason Cole
comment: This is the 3rd watchface I have purchased that claims certain features but does not deliver. It also won't let me refund it due to the time it takes to download, install and try out. Author, if you claim to be able to use multiple different widgets, next time specify that you can only use 2 or 3 at a time.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. If you read more carefully description of the app, it is clearly written: "Change the indicators to display on the 2 position". My app deliver what is described, but you do not took the time to read it. Your rating is quite unfair.

author: barry chandler
comment: Love this one. Easy to view and looks Great!

author: Billy Harris
comment: Love it

author: Kyle Knecht
comment: My go to watchface

author: Michael Gill
comment: Would love the option to change the clock font. Awesome looking face though. Also, I read through the one and two star reviews. It looks like they are user errors. This watch face has been great for me for many months possibly a year by now.
title: Great looking but...

author: Mario Augusto Felipe Santos-Ramos
comment: Doesn't matter which color scheme I choose on my watch, it doesn't refresh. The settings don't seem to work either. Using Nexus 6 with lg watch R.
title: Looking good but the colors don't change?

author: Alistair Castle
comment: Readings such as phone battery indicator is inaccurate. Irrespective shows my phone has 50% battery but my phone shows 100%
title: Not the best

author: dave mclaren
comment: Wasted my money on this one.
title: Inaccurate and does light does not pulsate.

author: Raymond Vargas
comment: I can't edit anything. Can't change color, presets or anything at all.

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
The whole settings are located in the "Android wear" app of your mobile.
Just hit the gear icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will show up !

author: Khyril Ichigo
comment: Just loved it...👍👍👍
title: Loved It

author: Randy Lewis
comment: I've spent so much time looking at watch faces, and I always keep coming back to this one. Great job developers in creating a watch face that is not only attractive but also very functional. Keep up the good work.
title: Excellent

author: Richard Cummings
comment: I love this watch face. It's very different but in a good way. It looks high tech while still being readable. There's tons of shortcuts right on the face itself.
title: One of my favourite watch faces

author: Jonathan Davis
comment: I normally use the futustic gui but this atomic is a special one. The color schemes and flexibility, along with the extra widgets is everything you need
title: One of best watch faces over

author: Quinton James
comment: This is beautiful to wear but it devours battery life to the point of making it useless.
title: Futuristic

author: Jason Mitchell
comment: I wear ties to work and my watch always matches my outfits...
title: Luv the color schemes

author: Alex Barroso
comment: Stable and runs well
title: Professional

author: David Watters
comment: Excellent face and customisation. Clock could of been a bit bigger. Takes a few touches to use the active areas with them being so small..overall a great looking face.
title: Atomic

author: Andrew Kajda
comment: Excellent, but if color was integrated, all components in the same pallet, rather than individual setting.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: That was my first idea, but many people like to choose different colors for each element. You can style apply colors from the same pallet to all elements by yourself :)

title: Motorola Moto X Pure

author: Daymien Ooi
comment: I like futuristic Watch Face and this is one of those. Prompt reply from dev when help needed. Good job! :)
title: Cool Watch Face

author: Krzysztof Kawka
comment: One of my favourite...
title: I really like this face...

author: Damon Braithwaite
comment: Really easy to use loads of options
title: Love it

author: Arijit Sarkar
comment: The face itself looks good on my huawei and zenwatch 2. Many customization options. However it can use an active preset community.
title: Liked it

author: Chris Porta
comment: Love this face. I think the time needs to be made a little bigger.  Next update maybe?
title: Great! Almost perfect...

author: Sean Hardesty
comment: This dev is really onto something with their watch faces. Good job!
title: Nice Face

author: Jed Dye
comment: Looks really good! I really like the fact that there are a lot of customization options! Great job

author: Matthew Faull
comment: Not a bad design

author: Becca Steudel
comment: I bought this because I wanted to have more information available to me, but the settings only allow you 2 widgets and 2 shortcuts (which can NOT be widgets). It is advertised as having 8 customizable areas of information, but I did not find that true. Luckily, I was able to get a refund.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. If you read carefully, it is said that there are 8 available indicators "to display on the 2 indicators areas", and that you can choose the shortcuts "to display on the 2 shortcuts areas". Sorry for the misunderstanding.

title: Only 2 widgets and 2 shortcuts!!

author: Howie Katts
comment: Unable to change weather to Fahrenheit or get rid of military time.
title: Cannot change displays

author: James Buckingham
comment: Tried installing this, but it doesn't show up on my G Watch R, or in the wear app on my phone.

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi. If you cannot see the watch face in your watch list, please go to Android Wear Application on mobile, open Settings and use Re-sync apps option.
If it does not work, please disconnect devices(watch and phone), uninstall the watch face, restart watch and connect device again. then finally install the watchface.

title: Won't install
